s8.chinese: 春，沛公為漢王，之南鄭。秋，還定雍。
s8.literal: Spring, Pei Gong becomes Han king, goes to Nan Zheng. Autumn, returns pacifies Yong.
s8.idiomatic: Spring, Duke Pei becomes King of Han, goes to Nanzheng. Autumn, returns and pacifies Yong.

s9.literal: One. Chancellor Xiao He guards Hanzhong.
s9.idiomatic: One. Chancellor Xiao He guards Hanzhong.

s11.literal: Imperial censor Zhou Ke guards Xingyang.
s11.idiomatic: Imperial censor Zhou Ke guards Xingyang.

s14.chinese: 春，定塞、翟、魏、河南、韓、殷國。夏，伐項籍，至彭城。立太子。還據滎陽。
s14.literal: Spring, pacifies Sai, Di, Wei, Henan, Han, Yin states. Summer, attacks Xiang Yu, reaches Pengcheng. Establishes crown prince. Returns holds Xingyang.
s14.idiomatic: Spring, pacifies Sai, Di, Wei, Henan, Han, Yin states. Summer, attacks Xiang Yu, reaches Pengcheng. Establishes crown prince. Returns to hold Xingyang.

s16.literal: One. Grand marshal Chang'an marquis Lu Wan.
s16.idiomatic: One. Grand marshal Marquis of Chang'an Lu Wan.

s20.chinese: 魏豹反。使韓信別定魏，伐趙。楚圍我滎陽。
s20.literal: Wei Bao rebels. Sends Han Xin separately pacifies Wei, attacks Zhao. Chu besieges our Xingyang.
s20.idiomatic: Wei Bao rebels. Sends Han Xin to separately pacify Wei, attack Zhao. Chu besieges our Xingyang.

s26.chinese: 使韓信別定齊及燕，太公自楚歸，與楚界洪渠。
s26.literal: Sends Han Xin separately pacifies Qi and Yan, Duke of Tai from Chu returns, with Chu demarcates boundary Hongqu.
s26.idiomatic: Sends Han Xin to separately pacify Qi and Yan, Duke of Tai returns from Chu, demarcates boundary with Chu at Hongqu.

s28.literal: Three. Zhou Ke guards Xingyang, dies.
s28.idiomatic: Three. Zhou Ke guards Xingyang, dies.

s29.literal: Imperial censor Fenying marquis Zhou Chang.
s29.idiomatic: Imperial censor Marquis of Fenying Zhou Chang.

s32.chinese: 冬，破楚垓下，殺項籍。春，王踐皇帝位定陶。。入都關中。
s32.literal: Winter, defeats Chu Gaixia, kills Xiang Yu. Spring, king ascends emperor throne Dingtao. Enters capital Guanzhong.
s32.idiomatic: Winter, defeats Chu at Gaixia, kills Xiang Yu. Spring, king ascends emperor throne at Dingtao. Enters capital in Guanzhong.

s34.literal: Four. After nine months, Wan becomes Yan king.
s34.idiomatic: Four. Nine months later, Wan becomes King of Yan.

s38.chinese: 尊太公為太上皇。劉仲為代王。立大市。更命咸陽曰長安。
s38.literal: Honors Duke of Tai as Supreme Emperor. Liu Zhong becomes Dai king. Establishes grand market. Renames Xianyang Chang'an.
s38.idiomatic: Honors Duke of Tai as Supreme Emperor. Liu Zhong becomes King of Dai. Establishes grand market. Renames Xianyang to Chang'an.

s39.chinese: 六。封為酇侯。。張蒼為計相。
s39.literal: Six. Enfeoffed as Tan marquis. Zhang Cang becomes accounting chancellor.
s39.idiomatic: Six. Enfeoffed as Marquis of Tan. Zhang Cang becomes accounting chancellor.

s44.chinese: 長樂宮成，自櫟陽徙長安。伐匈奴，匈奴圍我平城。
s44.literal: Changlegong Palace completed, from Yueyang moves Chang'an. Attacks Xiongnu, Xiongnu besiege our Pingcheng.
s44.idiomatic: Changlegong Palace completed, moves from Yueyang to Chang'an. Attacks Xiongnu, Xiongnu besiege our Pingcheng.

s50.chinese: 擊韓信反虜於趙城。貫高作亂，明年覺，誅之。匈奴攻代王，代王棄國亡，廢為郃陽侯。
s50.literal: Strikes Han Xin rebellion captives at Zhao city. Guan Gao creates disorder, next year discovered, executes them. Xiongnu attack Dai king, Dai king abandons kingdom flees, demoted to Heyang marquis.
s50.idiomatic: Strikes Han Xin rebellion at Zhaocheng. Guan Gao creates disorder, discovered next year, executed. Xiongnu attack King of Dai, King of Dai abandons kingdom and flees, demoted to Marquis of Heyang.

s56.chinese: 未央宮成，置酒前殿，太上皇輦上坐，帝奉玉卮上壽，曰：「始常以臣不如仲力，今臣功孰與仲多？」太上皇笑，殿上稱萬歲。徙齊田，楚昭、屈、景于關中。
s56.literal: Weiyang Palace completed, hosts banquet front hall, Supreme Emperor carriage throne sits, emperor presents jade goblet offers long life, says: 'Beginning often thought minister inferior to Zhong strength, now minister merit who with Zhong many?' Supreme Emperor laughs, hall cries ten thousand years. Relocates Qi Tian, Chu Zhao, Qu, Jing to Guanzhong.
s56.idiomatic: Weiyang Palace completed, hosts banquet in front hall, Supreme Emperor sits on throne, emperor presents jade goblet in toast, says: 'Formerly I often thought my strength inferior to Zhong's, now whose merit compares to Zhong's?' Supreme Emperor laughs, hall cries 'ten thousand years.' Relocates Qi Tian, Chu Zhao, Qu, Jing clans to Guanzhong.

s59.literal: Imperial censor Chang becomes Zhao chancellor.
s59.idiomatic: Imperial censor Chang becomes chancellor of Zhao.

s62.literal: Supreme Emperor passes away. Chen Xi rebels Dai territory.
s62.idiomatic: Supreme Emperor passes away. Chen Xi rebels in Dai territory.

s65.literal: Imperial censor Jiangyi marquis Zhao Yao.
s65.idiomatic: Imperial censor Marquis of Jiangyi Zhao Yao.

s68.literal: Executes Huaiyin, Peng Yue. Qing Bu rebels.
s68.idiomatic: Executes Huaiyin, Peng Yue. Qing Bu rebels.

s70.chinese: 周勃為太尉。攻代。後官省。
s70.literal: Zhou Bo becomes grand marshal. Attacks Dai. Later offices reduced.
s70.idiomatic: Zhou Bo becomes grand marshal. Attacks Dai. Later offices reduced.

s74.chinese: 冬，擊布。還過沛。夏，上崩，葬長陵。
s74.literal: Winter, strikes Bu. Returns passes Pei. Summer, emperor passes away, buried Changling.
s74.idiomatic: Winter, strikes Bu. Returns through Pei. Summer, emperor passes away, buried at Changling.

s80.chinese: 趙隱王如意死。始作長安城西北方。除諸侯丞相為相。
s80.literal: Zhao hidden king Ruyi dies. Begins makes Chang'an city northwest. Removes regional kings' chancellors becomes ministers.
s80.idiomatic: King Yin of Zhao Ruyi dies. Begins construction of Chang'an city northwest. Removes regional kings' chancellors, makes them ministers.

s86.chinese: 楚元王、齊悼惠王來朝。七月辛未，何薨。
s86.literal: Chu Yuan king, Qi Dao Hui king come to court. Seventh month Xinwei, He passes away.
s86.idiomatic: King Yuan of Chu, King Dao Hui of Qi come to court. Seventh month Xinwei, He passes away.

s87.chinese: 十四。七月癸巳，齊相平陽侯曹參為相國。
s87.literal: Fourteenth. Seventh month Guisi, Qi chancellor Pingyang marquis Cao Shen becomes prime minister.
s87.idiomatic: Fourteenth year. Seventh month Guisi, Qi chancellor Marquis of Pingyang Cao Shen becomes prime minister.

s92.chinese: 初作長安城。蜀湔氐反。擊之。
s92.literal: Initially constructs Chang'an city. Shu Jian Di rebels. Strikes them.
s92.idiomatic: Begins construction of Chang'an city. Shu Jian Di rebels. Strikes them.

s98.literal: Third month Jiazi, amnesty, nothing to be done again.
s98.idiomatic: Third month Jiazi, general amnesty, nothing to be repeated.

s104.chinese: 為高祖立廟於沛城成，置歌兒一百二十人。八月乙丑，參卒。
s104.literal: For Gaozu establishes temple at Pei city completion, places singing boys one hundred twenty people. Eighth month Yichou, Shen dies.
s104.idiomatic: Establishes temple for Gaozu upon completion of Pei city, places 120 singing boys. Eighth month Yichou, Shen dies.

s110.chinese: 七月，齊悼惠王薨。立太倉、西市。
s110.literal: Seventh month, Qi Dao Hui king passes away. Establishes grand granary, western market.
s110.idiomatic: Seventh month, King Dao Hui of Qi passes away. Establishes grand granary, western market.

s111.chinese: 一。十月己巳，安國侯王陵為右丞相。曲逆侯陳平為左丞相。
s111.literal: One. Tenth month Jisi, Anguo marquis Wang Ling becomes right chancellor. Quyi marquis Chen Ping becomes left chancellor.
s111.idiomatic: First year. Tenth month Jisi, Marquis of Anguo Wang Ling becomes right chancellor. Marquis of Quyi Chen Ping becomes left chancellor.

s113.chinese: 廣阿侯任敖為御史大夫。
s113.literal: Guang'e marquis Ren Ao becomes imperial censor.
s113.idiomatic: Marquis of Guang'e Ren Ao becomes imperial censor.

s116.chinese: 上崩。大臣用張辟彊計，呂氏權重，以呂台為呂王。立少帝。九月辛巳，葬安陵。
s116.literal: Emperor passes away. Ministers use Zhang Piqiang plan, Lu clan power heavy, makes Lu Tai Lu king. Establishes young emperor. Ninth month Xinsi, buried Anling.
s116.idiomatic: Emperor passes away. Ministers use Zhang Piqiang's plan, Lu clan power grows heavy, makes Lu Tai king of Lu. Establishes young emperor. Ninth month Xinsi, buried at Anling.

s122.chinese: 王孝惠諸子。置孝悌力田。
s122.literal: Kings Filial Emperor Hui various sons. Establishes filial piety fraternal duty agricultural strength.
s122.idiomatic: Makes various sons of Emperor Hui kings. Establishes filial piety, fraternal duty, agricultural strength categories.

s123.chinese: 三。十一月甲子，徙平為右丞相。辟陽侯審食其為左丞相。
s123.literal: Three. Eleventh month Jiazi, moves Ping to right chancellor. Piyang marquis Shen Shiqi becomes left chancellor.
s123.idiomatic: Third year. Eleventh month Jiazi, moves Ping to right chancellor. Marquis of Piyang Shen Shiqi becomes left chancellor.

s128.chinese: 十二月，呂王台薨，子嘉代立為呂王。行八銖錢。
s128.literal: Twelfth month, Lu king Tai passes away, son Jia succeeds stands as Lu king. Circulates eight zhu coins.
s128.idiomatic: Twelfth month, King Tai of Lu passes away, son Jia succeeds him as King of Lu. Circulates eight zhu coins.

s131.chinese: 平陽侯曹窋為御史大夫。。
s131.literal: Pingyang marquis Cao Tao becomes imperial censor.
s131.idiomatic: Marquis of Pingyang Cao Tao becomes imperial censor.

s140.chinese: 廢少帝，更立常山王弘為帝。
s140.literal: Deposes young emperor, replaces establishes Changshan king Hong as emperor.
s140.idiomatic: Deposes the young emperor, establishes King Hong of Changshan as emperor.

s141.literal: Six. Four. Establishes grand marshal office.
s141.idiomatic: Sixth year. Fourth month. Establishes grand marshal office.

s142.literal: One. Jiang marquis Zhou Bo becomes grand marshal.
s142.idiomatic: First year. Marquis of Jiang Zhou Bo becomes grand marshal.

s146.chinese: 八月，淮陽王薨，以其弟壺關侯武為淮陽王。令戍卒歲更。
s146.literal: Eighth month, Huaiyang king passes away, makes his younger brother Huguan marquis Wu Huaiyang king. Orders garrison troops annual rotation.
s146.idiomatic: Eighth month, King of Huaiyang passes away, makes his younger brother Marquis Wu of Huguan King of Huaiyang. Orders garrison troops annual rotation.

s152.chinese: 以呂產為呂王。四月丁酉，赦天下。晝昏。
s152.literal: Makes Lu Chan Lu king. Fourth month Dingyou, amnesty all under heaven. Day darkens.
s152.idiomatic: Makes Lu Chan king of Lu. Fourth month Dingyou, general amnesty. Day turns dark.

s158.chinese: 趙王幽死，以呂祿為趙王。梁王徙趙，自殺。
s158.literal: Zhao king You dies, makes Lu Lu Zhao king. Liang king moves to Zhao, commits suicide.
s158.idiomatic: King You of Zhao dies, makes Lu Lu king of Zhao. King of Liang transferred to Zhao, commits suicide.

s164.chinese: 七月，高后崩。九月，誅諸呂。後九月，代王至，踐皇帝位。後九月，食其免相。
s164.literal: Seventh month, Empress Gao passes away. Ninth month, executes various Lu. After nine months, Dai king arrives, ascends emperor throne. After nine months, Shiqi dismissed chancellor.
s164.idiomatic: Seventh month, Empress Gao passes away. Ninth month, executes the Lu clan. Nine months later, King of Dai arrives, ascends the emperor's throne. Nine months later, Shiqi dismissed from chancellor.

s165.chinese: 十。七月辛巳，為帝太傅。九月壬戌，復為丞相。八
s165.literal: Ten. Seventh month Xinsi, becomes emperor grand tutor. Ninth month Renxu, again becomes chancellor. Eight
s165.idiomatic: Tenth year. Seventh month Xinsi, becomes emperor's grand tutor. Ninth month Renxu, again becomes chancellor. Eight

s166.chinese: 五。隆慮侯灶為將軍，擊南越。
s166.literal: Five. Longlu marquis Zao becomes general, attacks Nanyue.
s166.idiomatic: Fifth year. Marquis of Longlu Zao becomes general, attacks Nanyue.

s170.chinese: 除收孥相坐律。立太子。賜民爵。
s170.literal: Abolishes confiscation family members mutual liability law. Establishes crown prince. Grants people nobility ranks.
s170.idiomatic: Abolishes law of confiscating family members for mutual liability. Establishes crown prince. Grants nobility ranks to the people.

s171.chinese: 十一。十一月辛巳，平徙為左丞相。太尉絳侯周勃為右丞相。
s171.literal: Eleven. Eleventh month Xinsi, Ping moves to left chancellor. Grand marshal Jiang marquis Zhou Bo becomes right chancellor.
s171.idiomatic: Eleventh year. Eleventh month Xinsi, Ping transferred to left chancellor. Grand marshal Marquis of Jiang Zhou Bo becomes right chancellor.

s172.chinese: 六。勃為相，潁陰侯灌嬰為太尉。
s172.literal: Six. Bo becomes chancellor, Yingyin marquis Guan Ying becomes grand marshal.
s172.idiomatic: Sixth year. Bo becomes chancellor, Marquis of Yingyin Guan Ying becomes grand marshal.

s176.chinese: 除誹謗律。皇子武為代王，參為太原王，揖為梁王。十月，丞相平薨。
s176.literal: Abolishes slander law. Imperial son Wu becomes Dai king, Shen becomes Taiyuan king, Yi becomes Liang king. Tenth month, Chancellor Ping passes away.
s176.idiomatic: Abolishes slander law. Imperial sons: Wu becomes king of Dai, Shen becomes king of Taiyuan, Yi becomes king of Liang. Tenth month, Chancellor Ping passes away.

s177.chinese: 一。十一月乙亥，絳侯勃復為丞相。
s177.literal: One. Eleventh month Yihai, Jiang marquis Bo again becomes chancellor.
s177.idiomatic: First year. Eleventh month Yihai, Marquis of Jiang Bo again becomes chancellor.

s182.chinese: 徙代王武為淮陽王。上幸太原。濟北王反。匈奴大入上郡。以地盡與太原，太原更號代。十一月壬子，勃免相，之國。
s182.literal: Transfers Dai king Wu to Huaiyang king. Emperor visits Taiyuan. Jibei king rebels. Xiongnu greatly enter Shangjun. Gives all land to Taiyuan, Taiyuan changes name to Dai. Eleventh month Renzi, Bo dismissed chancellor, goes to fief.
s182.idiomatic: Transfers King Wu of Dai to king of Huaiyang. Emperor visits Taiyuan. King of Jibei rebels. Xiongnu invade Shangjun in force. Gives all territory to Taiyuan, Taiyuan renamed Dai. Eleventh month Renzi, Bo dismissed from chancellor, returns to his fief.

s183.chinese: 一。十二月乙亥，太尉潁陰侯灌嬰為丞相。罷太尉官。
s183.literal: One. Twelfth month Yihai, grand marshal Yingyin marquis Guan Ying becomes chancellor. Abolishes grand marshal office.
s183.idiomatic: First year. Twelfth month Yihai, grand marshal Marquis of Yingyin Guan Ying becomes chancellor. Abolishes grand marshal office.

s184.chinese: 二。棘蒲侯陳武為大將軍，擊濟北。昌侯盧卿、共侯盧罷師、甯侯鸱、深澤侯將夜皆為將軍，屬武祁侯賀，將兵屯滎陽。
s184.literal: Two. Jipu marquis Chen Wu becomes grand general, attacks Jibei. Chang marquis Lu Qing, Gong marquis Lu Bashi, Ning marquis Chi, Shenze marquis Jiang Ye all become generals, subordinate to Wuqi marquis He, lead troops garrison Xingyang.
s184.idiomatic: Second year. Marquis of Jipu Chen Wu becomes grand general, attacks Jibei. Marquis Lu Qing of Chang, Marquis Lu Bashi of Gong, Marquis Chi of Ning, Marquis Jiang Ye of Shenze all become generals under Marquis He of Wuqi, lead troops to garrison Xingyang.

s189.chinese: 一。正月甲午，御史大夫北平侯張蒼為丞相。
s189.literal: One. First month Jiawu, imperial censor Beiping marquis Zhang Cang becomes chancellor.
s189.idiomatic: First year. First month Jiawu, imperial censor Marquis of Beiping Zhang Cang becomes chancellor.

s190.chinese: 安丘侯張說為將軍，擊胡，出代。
s190.literal: Anqiu marquis Zhang Yue becomes general, attacks Xiongnu, campaigns in Dai.
s190.idiomatic: Marquis of Anqiu Zhang Yue becomes general, attacks the Xiongnu, campaigns in Dai.

s191.chinese: 關中侯申屠嘉為御史大夫。
s191.literal: Guanzhong marquis Shentu Jia becomes imperial censor.
s191.idiomatic: Marquis of Guanzhong Shentu Jia becomes imperial censor.

s194.literal: Abolishes coin law, people may cast coins
s194.idiomatic: Abolishes coin monopoly law, allows people to mint coins

s200.chinese: 廢淮南王，遷嚴道，道死雍。
s200.literal: Deposes Huainan king, exiles Yan Dao, Dao dies in Yong.
s200.idiomatic: Deposes King of Huainan, exiles Yan Dao, Dao dies in Yong.

s206.literal: Fourth month Bingzi, initially establishes Nanling.
s206.idiomatic: Fourth month Bingzi, initially establishes Nanling.

s212.literal: Grand coachman Ruyin marquis Teng Gong dies.
s212.idiomatic: Grand coachman Marquis of Ruyin Teng Gong dies.

s218.chinese: 溫室鐘自鳴。以芷陽鄉為霸陵。
s218.literal: Warm chamber bell sounds by itself. Makes Zhiyang district Baling.
s218.idiomatic: Bell in warm chamber sounds spontaneously. Makes Zhiyang district into Baling.

s224.literal: Regional kings all arrive at Chang'an.
s224.idiomatic: All regional kings arrive at Chang'an.

s236.chinese: 河決東郡金隄。徙淮陽王為梁王。
s236.literal: Yellow River breaches Dongjun Jin dike. Transfers Huaiyang king to Liang king.
s236.idiomatic: Yellow River breaches Dongjun Jin dike. Transfers King of Huaiyang to King of Liang.

s242.chinese: 除肉刑及田租稅律、戍卒令。
s242.literal: Abolishes mutilating punishments and farmland tax laws, garrison soldier regulations.
s242.idiomatic: Abolishes mutilating punishments and farmland tax laws, garrison soldier regulations.

s248.chinese: 匈奴大入蕭關，發兵擊之，及屯長安旁。
s248.literal: Xiongnu greatly enter Xiaoguan, dispatch troops attack them, and garrison beside Chang'an.
s248.idiomatic: Xiongnu invade Xiaoguan in force, dispatch troops to attack them, and garrison beside Chang'an.

s250.chinese: 成侯董赤、內史欒布、昌侯盧卿、隆慮侯灶、甯侯鸱皆為將軍，東陽侯張相如為大將軍，皆擊匈奴。中尉周舍、郎中令張武皆為將軍，屯長安旁。
s250.literal: Cheng marquis Dong Chi, interior minister Luan Bu, Chang marquis Lu Qing, Longlu marquis Zao, Ning marquis Chi all become generals, Dongyang marquis Zhang Xiangru becomes grand general, all attack Xiongnu. Commandant Zhou She, palace secretary Zhang Wu all become generals, garrison beside Chang'an.
s250.idiomatic: Marquis Cheng Dong Chi, Interior Minister Luan Bu, Marquis Chang Lu Qing, Marquis Longlu Zao, Marquis Ning Chi all become generals, Marquis Dongyang Zhang Xiangru becomes grand general, all attack the Xiongnu. Commandant Zhou She, Palace Secretary Zhang Wu all become generals, garrison beside Chang'an.

s254.chinese: 黃龍見成紀。上始郊見雍五帝。
s254.literal: Yellow dragon appears at Chengji. Emperor begins suburban sacrifice sees Yong five emperors.
s254.idiomatic: Yellow dragon appears at Chengji. Emperor begins suburban sacrifices to the five emperors at Yong.

s260.literal: Emperor begins suburban sacrifice sees Weiyang five emperors.
s260.idiomatic: Emperor begins suburban sacrifices to the five emperors at Weiyang.

s266.chinese: 新垣平詐言方士，覺，誅之。
s266.literal: Xinyuan Ping falsely speaks fangshi, discovered, executes him.
s266.idiomatic: Xinyuan Ping falsely claims to be a fangshi, discovered, executes him.

s272.chinese: 匈奴和親。地動。八月戊辰，蒼免相。
s272.literal: Xiongnu peaceful marriage. Earth moves. Eighth month Wuchen, Cang dismissed chancellor.
s272.idiomatic: Xiongnu establish peaceful marriage alliance. Earthquake. Eighth month Wuchen, Cang dismissed from chancellor.

s273.chinese: 十五。八月庚午，御史大夫申屠嘉為丞相，封故安侯。
s273.literal: Fifteen. Eighth month Gengwu, imperial censor Shentu Jia becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Gu'an marquis.
s273.idiomatic: Fifteenth year. Eighth month Gengwu, imperial censor Shentu Jia becomes chancellor, enfeoffed as Marquis of Gu'an.

s296.chinese: 匈奴三萬人入上郡，二萬人入雲中。
s296.literal: Xiongnu thirty thousand enter Shangjun, twenty thousand enter Yunzhong.
s296.idiomatic: Xiongnu invade Shangjun with thirty thousand, Yunzhong with twenty thousand.

s298.chinese: 以中大夫令免為車騎將軍，軍飛狐，故楚相蘇意為將軍，軍句注；。將軍張武屯北地；河內守周亞夫為將軍，軍細柳；宗正劉禮軍霸上；祝茲侯徐厲軍棘門：以備胡。數月，胡去，亦罷。
s298.literal: Makes palace counselor Ling Mian carriage riding general, armies Feihu, former Chu chancellor Su Yi general, armies Gounote; General Zhang Wu garrisons Beidi; Hedong governor Zhou Yafu general, armies Xiliu; imperial clan administrator Liu Li armies Bashang; Zhuzi marquis Xu Li armies Jimen: to prepare Xiongnu. Several months, Xiongnu leave, also disband.
s298.idiomatic: Makes Palace Counselor Ling Mian carriage-riding general, armies at Feihu; former Chu chancellor Su Yi general, armies at Gounote; General Zhang Wu garrisons Beidi; Hedong governor Zhou Yafu general, armies at Xiliu; Imperial Clan Administrator Liu Li armies at Bashang; Marquis Zhuzi Xu Li armies at Jimen: to prepare for Xiongnu. Several months later, Xiongnu withdraw, armies also disband.

s302.chinese: 六月己亥，孝文皇帝崩。丁未，太子立。民出臨三日，葬霸陵。
s302.literal: Sixth month Jihai, Emperor Wen passes away. Dingwei, crown prince ascends. People mourn outside three days, buried Baling.
s302.idiomatic: Sixth month Jihai, Emperor Wen passes away. Dingwei, crown prince ascends throne. People mourn outside for three days, buried at Baling.

s304.chinese: 中尉亞夫為車騎將軍，郎中令張武為復土將軍，屬國捍為將屯將軍。詹事戎奴為車騎將軍，侍太后。
s304.literal: Commandant Yafu becomes carriage riding general, palace secretary Zhang Wu becomes earth covering general, frontier guard Han becomes garrison general. Palace steward Rong Nu becomes carriage riding general, serves empress dowager.
s304.idiomatic: Commandant Yafu becomes carriage-riding general; Palace Secretary Zhang Wu becomes earth-covering general; Frontier Guard Han becomes garrison general. Palace Steward Rong Nu becomes carriage-riding general, serves the empress dowager.

s308.chinese: 立孝文皇帝廟，郡國為太宗廟。
s308.literal: Establishes Emperor Wen temple, commanderies kingdoms make Supreme Ancestor temples.
s308.idiomatic: Establishes temple for Emperor Wen, commanderies and kingdoms make Supreme Ancestor temples.

s309.literal: Seven. Establishes director of works office.
s309.idiomatic: Seventh year. Establishes Director of Works office.

s314.chinese: 立皇子德為河閒王，閼為臨江王，餘為淮陽王，非為汝南王，彭祖為廣川王，發為長沙王。四月中，孝文太后崩。嘉卒。
s314.literal: Establishes imperial son De as Hejian king, Yan as Linjiang king, Yu as Huaiyang king, Fei as Runan king, Pengzu as Guangchuan king, Fa as Changsha king. Fourth month middle, Empress Dowager Wen passes away. Jia dies.
s314.idiomatic: Establishes imperial sons: De as King of Hejian, Yan as King of Linjiang, Yu as King of Huaiyang, Fei as King of Runan, Pengzu as King of Guangchuan, Fa as King of Changsha. Mid-fourth month, Empress Dowager Wen passes away. Jia dies.

s315.literal: Eight. Kaifeng marquis Tao Qing becomes chancellor.
s315.idiomatic: Eighth year. Marquis of Kaifeng Tao Qing becomes chancellor.

s320.chinese: 吳楚七國反，發兵擊，皆破之。皇子端為膠西王，勝為中山王。
s320.literal: Wu Chu seven kingdoms rebel, dispatch troops attack, all defeat them. Imperial son Duan becomes Jiaoxi king, Sheng becomes Zhongshan king.
s320.idiomatic: Wu and Chu seven kingdoms rebel, dispatch troops to attack them, defeat them all. Imperial sons: Duan becomes King of Jiaoxi, Sheng becomes King of Zhongshan.

s321.idiomatic: Second year. Establishes Grand Marshal office.

s322.chinese: 中尉條侯周亞夫。為太尉，擊吳楚；曲周侯酈寄為將軍，擊趙；竇嬰為大將軍，屯滎陽，欒布為將軍，擊齊。
s322.literal: Commandant Tiaohou Zhou Yafu. Becomes grand marshal, attacks Wu Chu; Quzhou marquis Li Ji becomes general, attacks Zhao; Dou Ying becomes grand general, garrisons Xingyang, Luan Bu becomes general, attacks Qi.
s322.idiomatic: Commandant Marquis Tiaohou Zhou Yafu becomes grand marshal, attacks Wu and Chu; Marquis of Quzhou Li Ji becomes general, attacks Zhao; Dou Ying becomes grand general, garrisons Xingyang; Luan Bu becomes general, attacks Qi.

s332.chinese: 置陽陵邑。丞相北平侯張蒼卒。
s332.literal: Establishes Yangling town. Chancellor Beiping marquis Zhang Cang dies.
s332.idiomatic: Establishes Yangling town. Chancellor Marquis of Beiping Zhang Cang dies.

s338.literal: Transfers Guangchuan king Pengzu to Zhao king.
s338.idiomatic: Transfers King Pengzu of Guangchuan to King of Zhao.

s341.literal: Imperial censor Yangling marquis Cen Mai.
s341.idiomatic: Imperial censor Marquis of Yangling Cen Mai.

s344.chinese: 廢太子榮為臨江王。四月丁巳，膠東王立為太子。青罷相。
s344.literal: Deposes crown prince Rong as Linjiang king. Fourth month Dingsi, Jiaodong king established as crown prince. Qing dismissed chancellor.
s344.idiomatic: Deposes Crown Prince Rong, makes him King of Linjiang. Fourth month Dingsi, King of Jiaodong established as crown prince. Qing dismissed from chancellor.

s345.chinese: 六月乙巳，太尉條侯亞夫為丞相。罷太尉官。
s345.literal: Sixth month Yisi, grand marshal Tiaohou marquis Yafu becomes chancellor. Abolishes grand marshal office.
s345.idiomatic: Sixth month Yisi, Grand Marshal Marquis Tiaohou Yafu becomes chancellor. Abolishes grand marshal office.

s356.chinese: 皇子越為廣川王，寄為膠東王。
s356.literal: Imperial son Yue becomes Guangchuan king, Ji becomes Jiaodong king.
s356.idiomatic: Imperial sons: Yue becomes King of Guangchuan, Ji becomes King of Jiaodong.

s362.chinese: 皇子乘為清河王。亞夫免相。
s362.literal: Imperial son Cheng becomes Qinghe king. Yafu dismissed chancellor.
s362.idiomatic: Imperial son Cheng becomes King of Qinghe. Yafu dismissed from chancellor.

s363.chinese: 四。御史大夫桃侯劉舍為丞相。
s363.literal: Four. Imperial censor Tao marquis Liu She becomes chancellor.
s363.idiomatic: Fourth year. Imperial censor Marquis of Tao Liu She becomes chancellor.

s368.chinese: 臨江王徵，自殺，葬藍田，燕數萬為銜士置冢上。
s368.literal: Linjiang king Zheng, commits suicide, buried Lantian, Yan several ten thousand for retainer gentlemen placed on tomb.
s368.idiomatic: King Zheng of Linjiang commits suicide, buried at Lantian. Yan several tens of thousands of retainer gentlemen placed on tomb.

s374.literal: Imperial son Shun becomes Changshan king.
s374.idiomatic: Imperial son Shun becomes King of Changshan.

s380.chinese: 梁孝王武薨。分梁為五國，王諸子：子買為梁王，明為濟川王，彭離為濟東王，定為山陽王，不識為濟陰王。
s380.literal: Liang Xiao king Wu passes away. Divides Liang into five kingdoms, kings various sons: son Mai becomes Liang king, Ming becomes Jichuan king, Pengli becomes Jidong king, Ding becomes Shanyang king, Bushi becomes Jiyin king.
s380.idiomatic: King Xiao Wu of Liang passes away. Divides Liang into five kingdoms, enfeoffs various sons: Mai becomes King of Liang, Ming becomes King of Jichuan, Pengli becomes King of Jidong, Ding becomes King of Shanyang, Bushi becomes King of Jiyin.

s386.chinese: 五月，地動。七月乙巳，日蝕。舍免相。
s386.literal: Fifth month, earth moves. Seventh month Yisi, sun eclipses. She dismissed chancellor.
s386.idiomatic: Fifth month, earthquake. Seventh month Yisi, solar eclipse. She dismissed from chancellor.

s387.chinese: 五。八月壬辰，御史大夫建陵侯衛綰為丞相。
s387.literal: Five. Eighth month Renchen, imperial censor Jianling marquis Wei Wan becomes chancellor.
s387.idiomatic: Fifth year. Eighth month Renchen, imperial censor Marquis of Jianling Wei Wan becomes chancellor.

s394.chinese: 六月丁丑，御史大夫岑邁卒。
s394.literal: Sixth month Dingchou, imperial censor Cen Mai dies.
s394.idiomatic: Sixth month Dingchou, imperial censor Cen Mai dies.

s398.chinese: 正月甲子，孝景皇帝崩。二月丙子，太子立。
s398.literal: First month Jiazi, Emperor Jing passes away. Second month Bingzi, crown prince ascends.
s398.idiomatic: First month Jiazi, Emperor Jing passes away. Second month Bingzi, crown prince ascends throne.

s405.chinese: 四。魏其侯竇嬰為丞相。置太尉。
s405.literal: Four. Weiqi marquis Dou Ying becomes chancellor. Establishes grand marshal.
s405.idiomatic: Fourth year. Marquis of Weiqi Dou Ying becomes chancellor. Establishes grand marshal office.

s406.literal: Wuan marquis Tian Fen becomes grand marshal.
s406.idiomatic: Marquis of Wuan Tian Fen becomes grand marshal.

s410.idiomatic: Establishes Maoling. Ying dismissed from chancellor.

s411.chinese: 二月乙未，太常柏至侯許昌為丞相。蚡免太尉。罷太尉官。
s411.literal: Second month Yiyou, grand master of ceremonies Bai Zhi marquis Xu Chang becomes chancellor. Fen dismissed grand marshal. Abolishes grand marshal office.
s411.idiomatic: Second month Yiyou, Grand Master of Ceremonies Marquis of Bai Zhi Xu Chang becomes chancellor. Fen dismissed from grand marshal. Abolishes grand marshal office.

s416.chinese: 東甌王廣武侯望率其眾四萬餘人來降，處廬江郡。
s416.literal: Dong'ou king Guangwu marquis Wang leads his multitude forty thousand plus people come surrender, places in Lujiang commandery.
s416.idiomatic: King of Dong'ou Marquis Guangwu Wang leads his multitude of over forty thousand people in surrender, settles them in Lujiang commandery.

s434.chinese: 正月，閩越王反。孝景太后崩。。昌免相。
s434.literal: First month, Minyue king rebels. Empress Dowager Jing passes away. Chang dismissed chancellor.
s434.idiomatic: First month, King of Minyue rebels. Empress Dowager Jing passes away. Chang dismissed from chancellor.

s435.chinese: 五。六月癸巳，武安侯田蚡為丞相。
s435.literal: Five. Sixth month Guisi, Wuan marquis Tian Fen becomes chancellor.
s435.idiomatic: Fifth year. Sixth month Guisi, Marquis of Wuan Tian Fen becomes chancellor.

s436.literal: Qing Di becomes crown prince grand tutor.
s436.idiomatic: Qing Di becomes crown prince's grand tutor.

s446.literal: Emperor first goes to Yong, suburban sacrifice sees five altars.
s446.idiomatic: Emperor first visits Yong, performs suburban sacrifices at the five altars.

s448.chinese: 夏，御史大夫韓安國為護軍將軍，衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，大行王恢為將屯將軍，太中大夫李息為材官將軍，篡單于馬邑，不合，誅恢。
s448.literal: Summer, imperial censor Han Anguo becomes protector general, guard commander Li Guang becomes brave cavalry general, grand coachman Gongsun He becomes light chariot general, grand herald Wang Hui becomes garrison general, palace counselor Li Xi becomes timber officer general, attack chanyu at Maiyi, unsuccessful, executes Hui.
s448.idiomatic: Summer, Imperial Censor Han Anguo becomes Protector General; Guard Commander Li Guang becomes Brave Cavalry General; Grand Coachman Gongsun He becomes Light Chariot General; Grand Herald Wang Hui becomes Garrison General; Palace Counselor Li Xi becomes Timber Officer General. They attack the Chanyu at Maiyi; unsuccessful, execute Hui.

s452.literal: Fifth month Bingzi, Yellow River breaches at Huluzi.
s452.idiomatic: Fifth month Bingzi, Yellow River breaches at Huluzi.

s458.literal: Twelfth month Dinghai, earth moves. Fen dies.
s458.idiomatic: Twelfth month Dinghai, earthquake. Fen dies.

s459.literal: Five. Pingji marquis Xue Ze becomes chancellor.
s459.idiomatic: Fifth year. Marquis of Pingji Xue Ze becomes chancellor.

s464.chinese: 十月，族灌夫家，棄魏其侯市。
s464.literal: Tenth month, exterminate Guan Fu's family, expose Weiqi marquis corpse in marketplace.
s464.idiomatic: Tenth month, Guan Fu's family is exterminated, Weiqi marquis's corpse exposed in the marketplace.

s470.literal: Southern Yi first establish postal stations.
s470.idiomatic: Southern Yi first establish postal stations.

s472.chinese: 太中大夫衛青為車騎將軍，出上谷；衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，出鴈門；大中大夫公孫敖為騎將軍，出代；太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，出雲中：皆擊匈奴。
s472.literal: Palace counselor Wei Qing becomes chariot cavalry general, departs Shanggu; guard commander Li Guang becomes brave cavalry general, departs Yanmen; palace counselor Gongsun Ao becomes cavalry general, departs Dai; grand coachman Gongsun He becomes light chariot general, departs Yunzhong: all attack Xiongnu.
s472.idiomatic: Palace Counselor Wei Qing becomes Chariot Cavalry General, departs Shanggu; Guard Commander Li Guang becomes Brave Cavalry General, departs Yanmen; Palace Counselor Gongsun Ao becomes Cavalry General, departs Dai; Grand Coachman Gongsun He becomes Light Chariot General, departs Yunzhong: all attack the Xiongnu.

s476.idiomatic: Lady Wei is established as empress.

s478.chinese: 車騎將軍青出雁門，擊匈奴。衛尉韓安國為將屯將軍，軍代，明年，屯漁陽卒。
s478.literal: Chariot cavalry general Qing departs Yanmen, attacks Xiongnu. Guard commander Han Anguo becomes garrison general, armies Dai, next year, garrisons Yuyang dies.
s478.idiomatic: Chariot Cavalry General Qing departs Yanmen, attacks the Xiongnu. Guard Commander Han Anguo becomes Garrison General, commands Dai, next year dies while garrisoning Yuyang.

s484.chinese: 春，車騎將軍衛青出雲中，至高闕，取河南地。
s484.literal: Spring, chariot cavalry general Wei Qing departs Yunzhong, reaches Gaoque, takes Henan land.
s484.idiomatic: Spring, Chariot Cavalry General Wei Qing departs Yunzhong, reaches Gaoque, conquers the Henan region.

s488.idiomatic: Xiongnu kill Prefect You of Dai.

s494.idiomatic: Xiongnu invade Dingxiang, Dai, and Shangjun commanderies.

s500.chinese: 匈奴殺代都尉朱英。澤免相。
s500.literal: Xiongnu kill Dai commander Zhu Ying. Ze dismissed chancellor.
s500.idiomatic: Xiongnu kill Commander Zhu Ying of Dai. Ze dismissed from chancellor.

s501.chinese: 八。十一月乙丑，御史大夫公孫弘為丞相，封平津侯。
s501.literal: Eight. Eleventh month Yi Chou, imperial censor Gongsun Hong becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Pingjin marquis.
s501.idiomatic: Eighth year. Eleventh month Yi Chou, Imperial Censor Gongsun Hong becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Pingjin.

s502.chinese: 春，長平侯衛青為大將軍，擊右賢。衛尉蘇建為游擊將軍，屬青。左內史李沮為強弩將軍，太僕賀為車騎將軍，代相李蔡為輕車將軍，岸頭侯張次公為將軍，大行息為將軍：皆屬大將軍，擊匈奴。
s502.literal: Spring, Changping marquis Wei Qing becomes grand general, attacks Right Sage. Guard commander Su Jian becomes roaming attack general, subordinate to Qing. Left palace secretary Li Ju becomes strong crossbow general, grand coachman He becomes chariot cavalry general, Dai chancellor Li Cai becomes light chariot general, Antou marquis Zhang Cigon becomes general, grand herald Xi becomes general: all subordinate to grand general, attack Xiongnu.
s502.idiomatic: Spring, Marquis of Changping Wei Qing becomes Grand General, attacks Right Sage. Guard Commander Su Jian becomes Roaming Attack General, subordinate to Qing. Left Palace Secretary Li Ju becomes Strong Crossbow General, Grand Coachman He becomes Chariot Cavalry General, Dai Chancellor Li Cai becomes Light Chariot General, Marquis of Antou Zhang Cigon becomes General, Grand Herald Xi becomes General: all subordinate to Grand General, attack the Xiongnu.

s508.chinese: 大將軍青再出定襄擊胡。合騎侯公孫敖為中將軍，太僕賀為左將軍，郎中令李廣為後將軍。翕侯趙信為前將軍，敗降匈奴。衛尉蘇建為右將軍，敗，身脫。左內史沮為彊弩將軍。皆屬青。
s508.literal: Grand general Qing again departs Dingxiang attacks barbarians. Combined cavalry marquis Gongsun Ao becomes middle general, grand coachman He becomes left general, palace attendant Li Guang becomes rear general. Xi marquis Zhao Xin becomes front general, defeated surrenders Xiongnu. Guard commander Su Jian becomes right general, defeated, body escapes. Left palace secretary Ju becomes strong crossbow general. All subordinate to Qing.
s508.idiomatic: Grand General Qing again departs Dingxiang to attack the barbarians. Marquis of Combined Cavalry Gongsun Ao becomes Middle General, Grand Coachman He becomes Left General, Palace Attendant Li Guang becomes Rear General. Marquis of Xi Zhao Xin becomes Front General, defeated and surrenders to Xiongnu. Guard Commander Su Jian becomes Right General, defeated but escapes with his life. Left Palace Secretary Ju becomes Strong Crossbow General. All subordinate to Qing.

s512.chinese: 十��中，淮南王安、衡山王賜謀反，皆自殺，國除。
s512.literal: Tenth month middle, Huainan king An, Hengshan king Ci plot rebellion, all commit suicide, states eliminated.
s512.idiomatic: Mid tenth month, King An of Huainan and King Ci of Hengshan plot rebellion, all commit suicide, their states eliminated.

s518.chinese: 匈奴入鴈門、代郡。江都王建反。膠東王子慶立為六安王。弘卒。
s518.literal: Xiongnu enter Yanmen, Dai commandery. Jiangdu king Jian rebels. Jiaodong prince Qing established as Liuan king. Hong dies.
s518.idiomatic: Xiongnu invade Yanmen and Dai commandery. King Jian of Jiangdu rebels. Prince Qing of Jiaodong established as King of Liuan. Hong dies.

s519.chinese: 四。御史大夫樂安侯李蔡為丞相。
s519.literal: Four. Imperial censor Le'an marquis Li Cai becomes chancellor.
s519.idiomatic: Fourth year. Imperial censor Marquis of Le'an Li Cai becomes chancellor.

s520.chinese: 冠軍侯霍去病為驃騎將軍，擊胡，至祁連；合騎侯敖為將軍。出北地；博望侯張騫、郎中令李廣為將軍，出右北平。
s520.literal: Champion marquis Huo Qubing becomes flying cavalry general, attacks barbarians, reaches Qilian; combined cavalry marquis Ao becomes general. Departs Beidi; Bowang marquis Zhang Qian, palace attendant Li Guang become generals, depart Right Beiping.
s520.idiomatic: Marquis of Champion Huo Qubing becomes Flying Cavalry General, attacks barbarians, reaches Qilian Mountains; Marquis of Combined Cavalry Ao becomes General. Departs Beidi; Marquis of Bowang Zhang Qian and Palace Attendant Li Guang become Generals, depart Right Beiping.

s524.idiomatic: Xiongnu invade Right Beiping and Dingxiang commanderies.

s532.chinese: 大將軍青出定襄，郎中令李廣為前將軍，太僕公孫賀為左將軍，主爵趙食其為右將軍，平陽侯曹襄為後將軍：擊單于。
s532.literal: Grand general Qing departs Dingxiang, palace attendant Li Guang becomes front general, grand coachman Gongsun He becomes left general, chief of nobles Zhao Shiqi becomes right general, Pingyang marquis Cao Xiang becomes rear general: attack chanyu.
s532.idiomatic: Grand General Qing departs Dingxiang, Palace Attendant Li Guang becomes Front General, Grand Coachman Gongsun He becomes Left General, Chief of Nobles Zhao Shiqi becomes Right General, Marquis of Pingyang Cao Xiang becomes Rear General: attack the Chanyu.

s536.literal: Cai guilty of encroaching imperial gardens, commits suicide.
s536.idiomatic: Cai convicted of encroaching on imperial gardens, commits suicide.

s537.chinese: 四。太子少傅武彊侯莊青翟為丞相。
s537.literal: Four. Crown prince junior tutor Wujiang marquis Zhuang Qingdi becomes chancellor.
s537.idiomatic: Fourth year. Crown Prince's Junior Tutor Marquis of Wujiang Zhuang Qingdi becomes chancellor.

s542.chinese: 四月乙巳，皇子閎為齊王，旦為燕王，胥為廣陵王。
s542.literal: Fourth month Yi Si, imperial prince Hong becomes King of Qi, Dan becomes King of Yan, Xu becomes King of Guangling.
s542.idiomatic: Fourth month Yi Si, Imperial Prince Hong becomes King of Qi, Dan becomes King of Yan, Xu becomes King of Guangling.

s554.literal: Qingdi guilty of crime, commits suicide.
s554.idiomatic: Qingdi convicted of a crime, commits suicide.

s555.chinese: 四。太子太傅高陵侯趙周為丞相。
s555.literal: Four. Crown prince grand tutor Gaoling marquis Zhao Zhou becomes chancellor.
s555.idiomatic: Fourth year. Crown Prince's Grand Tutor Marquis of Gaoling Zhao Zhou becomes chancellor.

s556.literal: Tang guilty of crime, commits suicide.
s556.idiomatic: Tang convicted of a crime, commits suicide.

s566.chinese: 立常山憲王子平為真定王，商為泗水王。六月中，河東汾陰得寶鼎。
s566.literal: Establish Changshan Xian king son Ping as Zhending king, Shang as Sishui king. Sixth month middle, Hedong Fenying obtains precious tripod.
s566.idiomatic: Establish Ping, son of King Xian of Changshan, as King of Zhending, and Shang as King of Sishui. Mid sixth month, Hedong's Fenying obtains a precious tripod.

s572.chinese: 三月中，南越相嘉反，殺其王及漢使者。八月，周坐酎金，自殺。
s572.literal: Third month middle, Nanyue chancellor Jia rebels, kills his king and Han envoy. Eighth month, Zhou guilty of sacrificial gold, commits suicide.
s572.idiomatic: Mid third month, Nanyue Chancellor Jia rebels, kills his king and the Han envoy. Eighth month, Zhou convicted of sacrificial gold offense, commits suicide.

s573.chinese: 四。九月辛巳，御史大夫石慶為丞相，封牧丘侯。
s573.literal: Four. Ninth month Xin Si, imperial censor Shi Qing becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Muqiu marquis.
s573.idiomatic: Fourth year. Ninth month Xin Si, Imperial Censor Shi Qing becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Muqiu.

s574.chinese: 衛尉路博德為伏波將軍，出桂陽；主爵楊僕為樓船將軍，出豫章：皆破南越。
s574.literal: Guard commander Lu Bode becomes Subduing Waves general, departs Guiyang; chief of nobles Yang Pu becomes Tower Ship general, departs Yuzhang: both defeat Nanyue.
s574.idiomatic: Guard Commander Lu Bode becomes Subduing Waves General, departs Guiyang; Chief of Nobles Yang Pu becomes Tower Ship General, departs Yuzhang: both defeat Nanyue.

s580.chinese: 故龍镪侯韓說為橫海將軍，出會稽；樓船將軍楊僕出豫章；中尉王溫舒出會稽：皆破東越。
s580.literal: Former Longqiang marquis Han Shuo becomes Transverse Sea general, departs Kuaiji; tower ship general Yang Pu departs Yuzhang; commander Wang Wenshu departs Kuaiji: all defeat Dongyue.
s580.idiomatic: Former Marquis of Longqiang Han Shuo becomes Transverse Sea General, departs Kuaiji; Tower Ship General Yang Pu departs Yuzhang; Commander Wang Wenshu departs Kuaiji: all defeat Dongyue.

s592.chinese: 秋，樓船將軍楊僕、左將軍荀彘出遼東，擊朝鮮。
s592.literal: Autumn, tower ship general Yang Pu, left general Xun Zhi depart Liaodong, attack Chaoxian.
s592.idiomatic: Autumn, Tower Ship General Yang Pu and Left General Xun Zhi depart Liaodong, attack Chaoxian.

s620.literal: Reform calendar, establish first month as year beginning.
s620.idiomatic: Calendar reformed, first month established as beginning of year.

s627.chinese: 十。三月丁卯，太僕公孫賀為丞相，封葛繹侯。
s627.literal: Tenth. Third month Dingmao, grand coachman Gongsun He becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Geyan marquis.
s627.idiomatic: Tenth year. Third month Dingmao, Grand Coachman Gongsun He becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Geyan.

s664.chinese: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，至余吾水上；游擊將軍韓說出五原；因杅將軍公孫敖：皆擊匈奴。
s664.literal: Spring, Ershi general Li Guangli departs Shuofang, reaches Yuwu waters; roaming attack general Han Shuo departs Wuyuan; Yindi general Gongsun Ao: all attack Xiongnu.
s664.idiomatic: Spring, Ershi General Li Guangli departs Shuofang, reaches Yuwu waters; Roaming Attack General Han Shuo departs Wuyuan; Yindi General Gongsun Ao: all attack the Xiongnu.

s692.literal: Winter, He guilty of witchcraft dies.
s692.idiomatic: Winter, He convicted of witchcraft, dies.

s698.chinese: 七月壬午，太子發兵，殺游擊將軍說、使者江充。
s698.literal: Seventh month Renwu, crown prince raises troops, kills roaming attack general Shuo, envoy Jiang Chong.
s698.idiomatic: Seventh month Renwu, crown prince raises troops, kills Roaming Attack General Shuo and Envoy Jiang Chong.

s699.chinese: 三月丁巳，涿郡太守劉屈氂為丞相，封彭城侯。
s699.literal: Third month Dingsi, Zhuojun prefect Liu Quli becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Pengcheng marquis.
s699.idiomatic: Third month Dingsi, Zhuojun Prefect Liu Quli becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Pengcheng.

s704.literal: Sixth month, Liu Quli because of witchcraft beheaded.
s704.idiomatic: Sixth month, Liu Quli executed for witchcraft.

s706.chinese: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，以兵降胡。重合侯莽通出酒泉，御史大夫商丘成出河西，擊匈奴。
s706.literal: Spring, Ershi general Li Guangli departs Shuofang, surrenders troops to barbarians. Chonghe marquis Mang Tong departs Jiuquan, imperial censor Shangqiu Cheng departs Hexi, attack Xiongnu.
s706.idiomatic: Spring, Ershi General Li Guangli departs Shuofang, surrenders his troops to the barbarians. Chonghe Marquis Mang Tong departs Jiuquan, Imperial Censor Shangqiu Cheng departs Hexi, attack the Xiongnu.

s711.chinese: 六月丁巳，大鴻臚田千秋為丞相，封富民侯。
s711.literal: Sixth month Dingsi, grand herald Tian Qianqiu becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Fumin marquis.
s711.idiomatic: Sixth month Dingsi, Grand Herald Tian Qianqiu becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Fumin.

s724.chinese: 二月己巳，光祿大夫霍光為大將軍，博陸侯；都尉金日磾為車騎將軍，秺侯；太僕安陽侯上官舛為大將軍。
s724.literal: Second month Jisi, palace counselor Huo Guang becomes grand general, Boluo marquis; commander Jin Midi becomes chariot cavalry general, Duo marquis; grand coachman Anyang marquis Shangguan Jian becomes grand general.
s724.idiomatic: Second month Jisi, Palace Counselor Huo Guang becomes Grand General, Marquis of Boluo; Commander Jin Midi becomes Chariot Cavalry General, Marquis of Duo; Grand Coachman Marquis of Anyang Shangguan Jian becomes Grand General.

s729.idiomatic: Fourth year. Ninth month, Midi dies.

s748.chinese: 三月癸酉，衛尉王莽為左將軍，騎都尉上官安為車騎將軍。
s748.literal: Third month Guiyou, guard commander Wang Mang becomes left general, cavalry commander Shangguan An becomes chariot cavalry general.
s748.idiomatic: Third month Guiyou, Guard Commander Wang Mang becomes Left General, Cavalry Commander Shangguan An becomes Chariot Cavalry General.

s766.chinese: 九月庚午，光祿勳張安世為右將軍。
s766.literal: Ninth month Gengwu, palace counselor Zhang Anshi becomes right general.
s766.idiomatic: Ninth month Gengwu, Palace Counselor Zhang Anshi becomes Right General.

s778.chinese: 十二月庚寅，中郎將范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
s778.literal: Twelfth month Gengyin, palace attendant general Fan Mingyou becomes Duliao general, attacks Wuwan.
s778.idiomatic: Twelfth month Gengyin, Palace Attendant General Fan Mingyou becomes Duliao General, attacks the Wuwan.

s783.chinese: 三月乙丑，御史大夫王訢為丞相，封富春侯。
s783.literal: Third month Yichou, imperial censor Wang Yin becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Fuchun marquis.
s783.idiomatic: Third month Yichou, Imperial Censor Wang Yin becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Fuchun.

s795.chinese: 十一月乙丑，御史大夫楊敞為丞相，封安平侯。
s795.literal: Eleventh month Yichou, imperial censor Yang Chang becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Anping marquis.
s795.idiomatic: Eleventh month Yichou, Imperial Censor Yang Chang becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Anping.

s796.chinese: 九月庚寅，衛尉平陵侯范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
s796.literal: Ninth month Gengyin, guard commander Pingling marquis Fan Mingyou becomes Duliao general, attacks Wuwan.
s796.idiomatic: Ninth month Gengyin, Guard Commander Marquis of Pingling Fan Mingyou becomes Duliao General, attacks the Wuwan.

s801.chinese: 九月戊戌，御史大夫蔡義為丞相，封陽平侯。
s801.literal: Ninth month Wuxu, imperial censor Cai Yi becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Yangping marquis.
s801.idiomatic: Ninth month Wuxu, Imperial Censor Cai Yi becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Yangping.

s802.chinese: 四月甲申，光祿大夫龍镪侯韓曾為前將軍。五月丁酉，水衡都尉趙充國為後將軍，右將軍張安世為車騎將軍。
s802.literal: Fourth month Jiashen, palace counselor Longqiang marquis Han Zeng becomes front general. Fifth month Dingyou, water commissioner Zhao Chongguo becomes rear general, right general Zhang Anshi becomes chariot cavalry general.
s802.idiomatic: Fourth month Jiashen, Palace Counselor Marquis of Longqiang Han Zeng becomes Front General. Fifth month Dingyou, Water Commissioner Zhao Chongguo becomes Rear General, Right General Zhang Anshi becomes Chariot Cavalry General.

s803.chinese: 御史大夫昌水侯田廣明。
s803.literal: Imperial censor Changshui marquis Tian Guangming.
s803.idiomatic: Imperial censor Marquis of Changshui Tian Guangming.

s814.chinese: 七月庚寅，御史大夫田廣明為祁連將軍，龍镪侯韓曾為後將軍，營平侯趙充國為蒲類將軍，度遼將軍平陵侯范明友為雲中太守，富民侯田順為虎牙將軍：皆擊匈奴。
s814.literal: Seventh month Gengyin, imperial censor Tian Guangming becomes Qilian general, Longqiang marquis Han Zeng becomes rear general, Yingping marquis Zhao Chongguo becomes Pulai general, Duliao general Pingling marquis Fan Mingyou becomes Yunzhong prefect, Fumin marquis Tian Shun becomes Huya general: all attack Xiongnu.
s814.idiomatic: Seventh month Gengyin, Imperial Censor Tian Guangming becomes Qilian General, Marquis of Longqiang Han Zeng becomes Rear General, Marquis of Yingping Zhao Chongguo becomes Pulai General, Duliao General Marquis of Pingling Fan Mingyou becomes Yunzhong Prefect, Marquis of Fumin Tian Shun becomes Huya General: all attack the Xiongnu.

s818.chinese: 三月戊子，皇后崩。六月乙丑，義薨。
s818.literal: Third month Wuzi, empress passes away. Sixth month Yichou, Yi dies.
s818.idiomatic: Third month Wuzi, empress passes away. Sixth month Yichou, Yi dies.

s819.chinese: 六月甲辰，長信少府韋賢為丞相，封扶陽侯。田廣明、田順擊胡還，皆自殺。充國奪將軍印。
s819.literal: Sixth month Jiachen, Changxin junior administrator Wei Xian becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Fuyang marquis. Tian Guangming, Tian Shun attack barbarians return, both commit suicide. Chongguo stripped of general seal.
s819.idiomatic: Sixth month Jiachen, Changxin Junior Administrator Wei Xian becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Fuyang. Tian Guangming and Tian Shun return from attacking barbarians, both commit suicide. Chongguo is stripped of his general seal.

s824.literal: Tenth month Yimao, establish Huo empress.
s824.idiomatic: Tenth month Yimao, Lady Huo is established as empress.

s837.literal: Four. Third month Gengwu, general Guang dies.
s837.idiomatic: Fourth year. Third month Gengwu, General Guang dies.

s838.chinese: 二月丁卯，侍中、中郎將霍禹為右將軍。
s838.literal: Second month Dingmao, attendant-in-ordinary, palace attendant general Huo Yu becomes right general.
s838.idiomatic: Second month Dingmao, Attendant-in-Ordinary and Palace Attendant General Huo Yu becomes Right General.

s842.chinese: 立太子。五月甲申，賢老，賜金百斤。
s842.literal: Establish crown prince. Fifth month Jiashen, Xian aged, grant gold hundred catties.
s842.idiomatic: Establish crown prince. Fifth month Jiashen, Xian aged, granted gold worth one hundred catties.

s843.chinese: 六月壬辰，御史大夫魏相為丞相，封高平侯。
s843.literal: Sixth month Renchen, imperial censor Wei Xiang becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Gaoping marquis.
s843.idiomatic: Sixth month Renchen, Imperial Censor Wei Xiang becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Gaoping.

s844.chinese: 七月，安世為大司馬、衛將軍。禹為大司馬。
s844.literal: Seventh month, Anshi becomes grand commander, guard general. Yu becomes grand commander.
s844.idiomatic: Seventh month, Anshi becomes Grand Commander and Guard General. Yu becomes Grand Commander.

s849.literal: Two. Seventh month Renyin, Yu waist beheaded.
s849.idiomatic: Second year. Seventh month Renyin, Yu executed by waist cutting.

s873.literal: Six. Eighth month Bingyin, Anshi dies.
s873.idiomatic: Sixth year. Eighth month Bingyin, Anshi dies.

s878.chinese: 上郊甘泉太畤、汾陰后土。
s878.literal: Emperor suburban sacrifices Ganquan supreme altar, Fenying queen earth.
s878.idiomatic: Emperor performs suburban sacrifices at Ganquan Supreme Altar and Fenying Queen Earth.

s880.chinese: 四月，樂成侯許延壽為強弩將軍。後將軍充國擊羌。酒泉太守辛武賢為破羌將軍。韓曾為大司馬、車騎將軍。
s880.literal: Fourth month, Yuecheng marquis Xu Yanshou becomes strong crossbow general. Rear general Chongguo attacks Qiang. Jiuquan prefect Xin Wuxian becomes break Qiang general. Han Zeng becomes grand commander, chariot cavalry general.
s880.idiomatic: Fourth month, Marquis of Yuecheng Xu Yanshou becomes Strong Crossbow General. Rear General Chongguo attacks the Qiang. Jiuquan Prefect Xin Wuxian becomes Break Qiang General. Han Zeng becomes Grand Commander and Chariot Cavalry General.

s884.chinese: 上郊雍五畤。祋祤出寶璧玉器。
s884.literal: Emperor suburban sacrifices Yong five altars. Fushi produces precious jade disks and jade vessels.
s884.idiomatic: Emperor performs suburban sacrifices at Yong's five altars. Fushi produces precious jade disks and jade vessels.

s891.chinese: 四月戊戌，御史大夫邴吉為丞相，封博陽侯。
s891.literal: Fourth month Wuxu, imperial censor Bing Ji becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Boyang marquis.
s891.idiomatic: Fourth month Wuxu, Imperial Censor Bing Ji becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Boyang.

s909.literal: Four. Fifth month Jiachou, Zeng dies.
s909.idiomatic: Fourth year. Fifth month Jiachou, Zeng dies.

s910.chinese: 五月，延壽為大司馬、車騎將軍。
s910.literal: Fifth month, Yanshou becomes grand commander, chariot cavalry general.
s910.idiomatic: Fifth month, Yanshou becomes Grand Commander and Chariot Cavalry General.

s915.chinese: 三月壬申，御史大夫黃霸為丞相，封建成侯。
s915.literal: Third month Renshen, imperial censor Huang Ba becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Jiancheng marquis.
s915.idiomatic: Third month Renshen, Imperial Censor Huang Ba becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Jiancheng.

s927.literal: Three. Third month Dingwei, Yanshou dies.
s927.idiomatic: Third year. Third month Dingwei, Yanshou dies.

s932.chinese: 赦殊死，賜高年及鰥寡孤獨帛，女子牛酒。
s932.literal: Pardon capital punishment, grant silk to elderly and widowers/widows/orphans, women oxen wine.
s932.idiomatic: Pardon capital punishment, grant silk to the elderly and widows/widowers/orphans, women oxen and wine.

s939.chinese: 七月丁巳，御史大夫于定國為丞相，封西平侯。
s939.literal: Seventh month Dingsi, imperial censor Yu Dingguo becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Xiping marquis.
s939.idiomatic: Seventh month Dingsi, Imperial Censor Yu Dingguo becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Xiping.

s941.chinese: 太僕陳萬年為御史大夫。
s941.literal: Grand coachman Chen Wannian becomes imperial censor.
s941.idiomatic: Grand Coachman Chen Wannian becomes imperial censor.

s952.chinese: 樂陵侯史子長為大司馬、車騎將軍。太子太傅蕭望之為前將軍。
s952.literal: Leling marquis Shi Zichang becomes grand commander, chariot cavalry general. Crown prince grand tutor Xiao Wangzhi becomes front general.
s952.idiomatic: Marquis of Leling Shi Zichang becomes Grand Commander and Chariot Cavalry General. Crown Prince's Grand Tutor Xiao Wangzhi becomes Front General.

s970.chinese: 十二月，執金吾馮奉世為右將軍。
s970.literal: Twelfth month, commander of imperial equipage Feng Fengshi becomes right general.
s970.idiomatic: Twelfth month, Commander of Imperial Equipage Feng Fengshi becomes Right General.

s982.chinese: 二月丁巳，平恩侯許嘉為左將軍。
s982.literal: Second month Dingsi, Ping'en marquis Xu Jia becomes left general.
s982.idiomatic: Second month Dingsi, Marquis of Ping'en Xu Jia becomes Left General.

s983.chinese: 中少府貢禹為御史大夫。十二月丁未，長信少府薛廣德為御史大夫。
s983.literal: Central junior administrator Gong Yu becomes imperial censor. Twelfth month Dingwei, Changxin junior administrator Xue Guangde becomes imperial censor.
s983.idiomatic: Central Junior Administrator Gong Yu becomes Imperial Censor. Twelfth month Dingwei, Changxin Junior Administrator Xue Guangde becomes Imperial Censor.

s987.literal: Nine. Seventh month, Zichang dismissed, returns to residence.
s987.idiomatic: Ninth year. Seventh month, Zichang dismissed, returns to his residence.

s988.chinese: 九月，衛尉平昌侯王接為大司馬、車騎將軍。二月，廣德免。
s988.literal: Ninth month, guard commander Pingchang marquis Wang Jie becomes grand commander, chariot cavalry general. Second month, Guangde dismissed.
s988.idiomatic: Ninth month, Guard Commander Marquis of Pingchang Wang Jie becomes Grand Commander and Chariot Cavalry General. Second month, Guangde dismissed.

s989.chinese: 七月，太子太傅韋玄成為御史大夫。
s989.literal: Seventh month, crown prince grand tutor Wei Xuancheng becomes imperial censor.
s989.idiomatic: Seventh month, Crown Prince's Grand Tutor Wei Xuancheng becomes Imperial Censor.

s992.literal: Third month Renshu new moon, solar eclipse.
s992.idiomatic: Third month Renshu new moon, solar eclipse.

s993.chinese: 二月丁酉，御史大夫韋玄成為丞相，封扶陽侯。丞相賢子。
s993.literal: Second month Dingyou, imperial censor Wei Xuancheng becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Fuyang marquis. Chancellor Xian son.
s993.idiomatic: Second month Dingyou, Imperial Censor Wei Xuancheng becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Fuyang. Son of Chancellor Xian.

s994.chinese: 七月，太常任千秋為奮武將軍，擊西羌；雲中太守韓次君為建威將軍，擊羌。後不行。
s994.literal: Seventh month, grand master of ceremonies Ren Qianqiu becomes Fenwu general, attacks Western Qiang; Yunzhong prefect Han Cijun becomes Jianwei general, attacks Qiang. Later does not proceed.
s994.idiomatic: Seventh month, Grand Master of Ceremonies Ren Qianqiu becomes Fenwu General, attacks Western Qiang; Yunzhong Prefect Han Cijun becomes Jianwei General, attacks Qiang. Later does not proceed.

s995.chinese: 二月丁酉，右扶風鄭弘為御史大夫。
s995.literal: Second month Dingyou, right governor of Fufeng Zheng Hong becomes imperial censor.
s995.idiomatic: Second month Dingyou, Right Governor of Fufeng Zheng Hong becomes imperial censor.

s1000.chinese: 右將軍平恩侯許嘉為車騎將軍，侍中、光祿大夫樂昌侯王商為右將軍，右將軍馮奉世為左將軍。
s1000.literal: Right general Ping'en marquis Xu Jia becomes chariot cavalry general, attendant-in-ordinary, palace counselor Lechang marquis Wang Shang becomes right general, right general Feng Fengshi becomes left general.
s1000.idiomatic: Right General Marquis of Ping'en Xu Jia becomes Chariot Cavalry General, Attendant-in-Ordinary and Palace Counselor Marquis of Lechang Wang Shang becomes Right General, Right General Feng Fengshi becomes Left General.

s1025.chinese: 光祿勳匡衡為御史大夫。
s1025.literal: Palace counselor Kuang Heng becomes imperial censor.
s1025.idiomatic: Palace Counselor Kuang Heng becomes imperial censor.

s1029.chinese: 七月癸亥，御史大夫匡衡為丞相，封樂安侯。
s1029.literal: Seventh month Guihai, imperial censor Kuang Heng becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Le'an marquis.
s1029.idiomatic: Seventh month Guihai, Imperial Censor Kuang Heng becomes chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Le'an.

s1031.chinese: 衛尉繁延壽為御史大夫。
s1031.literal: Guard commander Fan Yanshou becomes imperial censor.
s1031.idiomatic: Guard Commander Fan Yanshou becomes imperial censor.

s1048.chinese: 六月己未，衛尉楊平侯王鳳為大司馬、大將軍。延壽卒。
s1048.literal: Sixth month Jiwei, guard commander Yangping marquis Wang Feng becomes grand commander, grand general. Yanshou dies.
s1048.idiomatic: Sixth month Jiwei, Guard Commander Marquis of Yangping Wang Feng becomes Grand Commander and Grand General. Yanshou dies.

s1049.chinese: 三月丙寅，太子少傅張譚為御史大夫。
s1049.literal: Third month Bingyin, crown prince junior tutor Zhang Tan becomes imperial censor.
s1049.idiomatic: Third month Bingyin, Crown Prince's Junior Tutor Zhang Tan becomes imperial censor.

s1065.chinese: 七。八月癸丑，遣光祿勳詔嘉上印綬免，賜金二百斤。
s1065.literal: Seven. Eighth month Guiyou, sends palace counselor Zhao Jia to submit seals and cords dismissed, grants gold two hundred catties.
s1065.idiomatic: Seventh year. Eighth month Guiyou, sends Palace Counselor Zhao Jia to submit seals and cords and resign, grants gold worth two hundred catties.

s1066.chinese: 十月，右將軍樂昌侯王商為光祿大夫、右將軍，執金吾弋陽侯任千秋為右將軍。譚免。
s1066.literal: Tenth month, right general Lechang marquis Wang Shang becomes palace counselor, right general, commander of imperial equipage Yiyang marquis Ren Qianqiu becomes right general. Tan dismissed.
s1066.idiomatic: Tenth month, Right General Marquis of Lechang Wang Shang becomes Palace Counselor and Right General, Commander of Imperial Equipage Marquis of Yiyang Ren Qianqiu becomes Right General. Tan dismissed.

s1071.chinese: 三月甲申，右將軍樂昌侯王商為右丞相。

s1072.chinese: 任千秋為左將軍，長樂衛尉史丹為右將軍。十月己亥，尹忠自剌殺。

s1090.chinese: 十月辛卯，史丹為左將軍，太僕平安侯王章為右將軍。

s1095.chinese: 六月丙午，諸吏散騎光祿大夫張禹為丞相。

s1109.chinese: 六月，太僕王音為御史大夫。

s1114.chinese: 九月甲子，御史大夫王音為車騎將軍。

s1115.chinese: 十月乙卯，光祿勳于永為御史大夫。

s1119.chinese: 七月乙丑，右將軍光祿勳平安侯王章卒。
